entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing overnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
